message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. This gives us both a good chunk of the money.
Alice, let's be real - that first offer was way off.  I'm proposing a more balanced split this time.
Bob, let's find a compromise.  I've moved closer to your number, but time is costing us both money.
Alice, we're running out of time here.  This is my final offer - take it or leave it.
